languages.text: "Вам понравился... Махарий?" {n}Иокаста моментально стряхивает удивление и с каменным лицом отчеканивает:{/n} "Я хотела сказать, я рада, что кузен заслужил вашу благосклонность, Лорд-капитан!"
"You liked... Macharius?" {n}She instantly shakes off her surprise and continues with a stony face:{/n} "I meant to say, I am glad my cousin has earned your favour, Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: "Вам понравился... Махарий?" {n}Иокаста моментально стряхивает удивление и с каменным лицом отчеканивает:{/n} "Я хотела сказать, я рада, что кузен заслужил вашу благосклонность, Лорд-капитан!"

traits.locale_text: "You liked... Macharius?" {n}Jocasta instantly shakes off her surprise and retorts with a stony face:{/n} "I meant to say I am glad my brother has earned your favor, Lord Captain!"
"You liked... Macharius?" {n}Jocasta instantly shakes off her surprise and retorts with a stony face:{/n} "I meant to say I am glad my brother has earned your favor, Lord Captain!"

"You liked... Macharius?" {n}She instantly shakes off her surprise and continues with a stony face:{/n} "I meant to say, I am glad my cousin has earned your favour, Lord Captain!"
"You liked... Macharius?" {n}She instantly shakes off her surprise and continues with a stony face:{/n} "I meant to say, I am glad my cousin has earned your favour, Lord Captain!"

languages.text: « Vous avez réussi à vous entendre... avec Macharius ? » {n}Un instant surprise, elle retrouve très vite son masque de pierre.{/n} « Je veux dire, je suis ravie que mon cousin ait gagné vos faveurs, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! »
languages.original_text: "You liked... Macharius?" {n}She instantly shakes off her surprise and continues with a stony face:{/n} "I meant to say, I am glad my cousin has earned your favour, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez réussi à vous entendre... avec Macharius ? » {n}Un instant surprise, elle retrouve très vite son masque de pierre.{/n} « Je veux dire, je suis ravie que mon frère ait gagné vos faveurs, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! »

languages.text: «¿Le... cayó bien Macharius?». {n}Borra en un instante su expresión sorprendida y continúa con un rostro pétreo:{/n} «Quiero decir, ¡me alegro de que mi primo se haya ganado su favor, Lord Capitán!».
languages.original_text: "You liked... Macharius?" {n}She instantly shakes off her surprise and continues with a stony face:{/n} "I meant to say, I am glad my cousin has earned your favour, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Le... cayó bien Macharius?». {n}Borra en un instante su expresión sorprendida y continúa con un rostro pétreo:{/n} «Quiero decir, ¡me alegro de que mi hermano se haya ganado su favor, Lord Capitán!».

languages.text: “您喜欢……马卡里乌斯？”{n}她脸上震惊的表情稍纵即逝，马上恢复了原本冷漠的神态。{/n}“我是想说，我很高兴我表哥赢得了您的青睐，舰长大人！”
languages.original_text: "You liked... Macharius?" {n}She instantly shakes off her surprise and continues with a stony face:{/n} "I meant to say, I am glad my cousin has earned your favour, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: “您喜欢……马卡里乌斯？”{n}她脸上震惊的表情稍纵即逝，马上恢复了原本冷漠的神态。{/n}“我是想说，我很高兴我哥哥赢得了您的青睐，舰长大人！”

languages.text: 「マハリウスが…良かったと？」{n}彼女は即座に驚きを振り払い、険しい顔で続けた。{/n}「私が言いたかったのは、私のいとこがロード・キャプテンに気に入っていただけて、嬉しいという事です！」
languages.original_text: "You liked... Macharius?" {n}She instantly shakes off her surprise and continues with a stony face:{/n} "I meant to say, I am glad my cousin has earned your favour, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: 「マカリウスの事を…好きだったのか？」{n}彼女は即座に驚きを振り払い、険しい顔で続けた。{/n}「私が言いたかったのは、私の兄弟のがロード・キャプテンに気に入っていただけて、嬉しいという事です！」

languages.text: "Ihr mochtet ... Macharius?" {n}Sie schüttelt ihre Überraschung sofort ab und fährt mit steinerne Miene fort:{/n} "Ich wollte sagten: Es freut mich, dass sich mein Cousin Eure Gunst verdient hat, Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: "You liked... Macharius?" {n}She instantly shakes off her surprise and continues with a stony face:{/n} "I meant to say, I am glad my cousin has earned your favour, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr mochtet ... Macharius?" {n}Sie schüttelt ihre Überraschung sofort ab und fährt mit steinerne Miene fort:{/n} "Ich wollte sagten: Es freut mich, dass sich mein Bruder Eure Gunst verdient hat, Lord Captain!"

languages.text: "Macharius'u... Sevdiniz mi?" {n}Şaşkınlığını anında üzerinden atıyor ve sözlerine katı bir yüz ifadesiyle devam ediyor.{/n} "Demek istediğim, kuzenimin takdirinizi kazanmış olmasına sevindim Lord Kaptan!"
languages.original_text: "You liked... Macharius?" {n}She instantly shakes off her surprise and continues with a stony face:{/n} "I meant to say, I am glad my cousin has earned your favour, Lord Captain!"
